snippet.title: Vista Golf Rivals: Environments Preview
snippet.description:
Vista Golf Rivals launches on the iOS App Store 8/7!

The elegant mini golf game you know and love, now with competitive multiplayer, beautiful new courses, and cash betting. You’ve had your practice in Vista Golf, now put your skills to the test in Vista Golf Rivals!

• Play 1v1 multiplayer or compete in tournaments 
• Play for Free or Wager Real Cash
• Procedurally generated course every game - never play the same hole twice
• Simple, one-handed controls
